@guozhangwang please see in Effective Java, 2nd edition, "Item 43: Return empty arrays or collections, not nulls"

I'm afraid I hopelessly broke this PR beyond all hope when I rebased, not sure what happened to be honest. And then I accidentally closed it when trying to recreate the branch with a clean history. 
Will recreate from fresh branch, sorry for the confusion!

@mjsax as discussed offline, the stream broker compatibility changes are already in so nothing left.

@junrao We have run stress tests on builds which include this patch based on the 0.10.1.1 tag, the 0.10.2 branch and the trunk branch. 
We were unable to reproduce the memory leak and feel comfortable with this change.
@halorgium : Thanks a lot for testing this. I will merge this to 0.10.1, 0.10.2 and trunk.

Hi, not sure what the convention is, but is this ready for review?
@apurvam, if you want to take a look at the general approach, sure. Detailed review, not yet as I have to fix a few minor things (will remove the WIP once that's done).
@guozhangwang Call for final review and merging.
